title: Отчаянная невеста
overview: Alice is slightly over 30. Having suffered another failure in love, she realizes that the last five years of her life — according to her worried mother — were wasted. The girl makes a bet with her mother — within a year she must find a husband. Being a student of the directing faculty of the film school, Alice decides to make a film about her future husband, but first she needs to find the perfect candidate who would meet her requirements and at the same time be an interesting film character.
